subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text: Possibly related to {{w|Proto-Tai language|Proto-Tai}}, compare {{cog|th|เลียน||to mimic}}, or from {{w|Sino-Tibetan languages|Sino-Tibetan}}; compare {{cog|lus|zeelᴸ||to walk along, a road along a hillside}} and {{cog|kac|mə³¹-jan³³||flow along a cliff}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}); nevertheless, Schuessler found Middle Chinese descendant's rounded element difficult to reconcile phonologically with these items and proposes also a derivation from {{och-l|由}}.
